00066 #ifndef MCMCPARAMS_H_
00067 #define MCMCPARAMS_H_
00068 
00072 struct MCMCParams
00073 {
00074     // No. of chains which MCMC will use
00075   int numChains;
00076     // Min. no. of burn-in steps MCMC will take per chain
00077   int burnMinSteps;
00078     // Max. no. of burn-in steps MCMC will take per chain
00079   int burnMaxSteps;
00080     // Min. no. of sampling steps MCMC will take per chain
00081   int minSteps;
00082     // Max. no. of sampling steps MCMC will take per chain
00083   int maxSteps;
00084     // Max. no. of seconds MCMC should run
00085   int maxSeconds;
00086 };
00087 
00088 #endif /*MCMCPARAMS_H_*/
